metadata.description: Exceptions and estimates for countries/dimensions where real data is unavailable
metadata.methodology: When no real data exists, we estimate based on regional averages, GDP correlation, or expert assessments. All estimates are marked with low confidence.

healthcareAccess.reason: No WHO UHC data - country does not participate in international health surveys
healthcareAccess.methodology: Estimated based on reports from defectors, NGOs, and satellite imagery analysis of healthcare facilities

economicOpportunity.reason: No World Bank GINI data - closed economy with no international reporting
economicOpportunity.methodology: Estimated based on centrally planned economy characteristics and reports of severe inequality

healthcareAccess.methodology: Estimated based on regional East African averages adjusted for GDP and isolation

justiceAccess.reason: No WJP Rule of Law Index coverage due to ongoing conflict
justiceAccess.methodology: Estimated based on fragile state indicators and regional assessments

governmentResponsiveness.reason: Limited central government control over territory
governmentResponsiveness.methodology: Estimated based on territorial control data and governance reports

economicOpportunity.reason: No recent GINI data due to ongoing conflict and displacement
economicOpportunity.methodology: Estimated based on conflict economy characteristics and humanitarian reports

healthcareAccess.reason: Healthcare system severely damaged by civil war
healthcareAccess.methodology: Pre-war baseline adjusted for documented destruction of healthcare infrastructure

housingSecurity.methodology: Estimated based on UN displacement figures and infrastructure damage assessments

healthcareAccess.reason: Healthcare system collapsed due to ongoing conflict
healthcareAccess.methodology: Estimated based on humanitarian crisis indicators

socialInclusion.reason: Severe restrictions on women's rights under Taliban rule since 2021
socialInclusion.methodology: Based on documented restrictions on women's education, employment, and movement

workplaceRights.reason: Women banned from most employment, unions prohibited
workplaceRights.methodology: Based on Taliban edicts and documented labor restrictions

pressFreedom.reason: One of the most closed media environments globally
pressFreedom.methodology: RSF consistently ranks among worst; no independent media exists

confidenceLevels.high: Multiple reliable sources confirm this estimate
confidenceLevels.medium: Based on partial data and reasonable extrapolation
confidenceLevels.very_low: Almost no verifiable data, rough estimate only

defaultValues.description: When no data exists and no specific exception is documented, we use regional averages
defaultValues.methodology: Calculate average of neighboring countries with available data, adjusted for GDP per capita correlation
